statements: UPDATE books SET title = 'New Title 1' WHERE book_id = 1;
UPDATE books SET publish_date = '2021-12-31', tags = ARRAY['fiction', 'mystery'] WHERE author = 'John Doe';

UPDATE books SET title='The Great Gatsby', author='F. Scott Fitzgerald', publish_date='1925-04-10', category='Fiction', tags='{Classic, Drama}', description='A novel about the Jazz Age in America' WHERE book_id=1;

UPDATE books SET author='J.K. Rowling', publish_date='1997-06-26', category='Fantasy', tags='{Wizardry}', title='Harry Potter and the Philosopher''s Stone', description='The first book in the Harry Potter series' WHERE book_id=5;
UPDATE categories SET category_name = 'Science Fiction' WHERE category_id = 1;
UPDATE books SET author = 'Jane Doe', publish_year = 2010 WHERE book_id = 3;
UPDATE books SET publish_year = 2000, author = 'John Doe' WHERE book_id = 1
